Bulletin

Mar 21, 2022

Hi Friends,

As a software maker working by myself, almost all my meetings are between the left and right sides of my brain. I'm pretty good company so I usually don't mind, but sometimes these pow-wows get nebulously pendulous:

"You're writing too much code, you need to spend more time promoting Kinopio!"

"You haven't released anything new in over a week â€“ code faster!"

Fortunately it's time to write this month's bulletin. Looking back on everything that's new this month gives me a tangible feeling of accomplishment, and maybe even determination.

What's New

  • Undo/Redo edited cards and connections â€“ pretty much every action is now reversible
  • Pin Spaces List to keep it open while jumping from space to space
  • Export All Spaces together
  • Email Improvements to weekly reviews and notification emails
  • Search Match Highlighting make filtering and space searching results easier to identify
  • Locked cards can't be selected or edited â€“ Use them for backgrounds, or for content that your collaborators shouldn't edit
  • Mobile Improvements that give you more room to breathe and think on small screens
  • Add cards to your spaces wherever you are with Firefox and Chrome browser extensions (Safari coming soon~)
